SELECT su.id,su.name,su.mobile,su.email,su.no,su.login_ip,su.login_date, su.company_id,su.office_id,GROUP_CONCAT(sr.name) roles FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON su.id = sur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.id
su.company_id = #{officeId}
and su.office_id = #{officeId}
and su.name like concat('%', #{name} ,'%')
and su.no like concat('%', #{no} ,'%')
and FIND_IN_SET(sr.id,#{roles})
and su.del_flag = 0
GROUP BY su.id ORDER BY su.update_date desc
